page.title: 14RELIGION - SULLINGTON
page.content: Religion in Sullington can be divided into three main groups - Church of England, Roman Catholic and Methodist. There are two Churches in Sullington, both Church of England denomination. St. Mary's Sullington, is a Saxon Church with later details; it contains a squint and an effigy of a Knight of uncertain date, carved in marble. St. Mary's Washington, was built in its present form in 1867 on the site of, and using some of the stones of two previous Churches of the twelfth century. A number of memorial tablets from the previous Church have also been incoporated.
